about_the_game:
In the mystical world of Lost Age, darkness looms, and heroes rise to reclaim the light. Embark on a captivating adventure where card-based strategy meets the excitement of RPG. Collect and customize powerful heroes, explore magical realms, and tackle thrilling challenges—all at your own pace. With idle mechanics, your journey continues even when you're offline, making Lost Age the perfect mix of relaxation and epic discovery.

Key Features:

Progress Anytime – Even When Offline!

Your heroes continue their journey while you're away, gathering resources and battling enemies. Log in to collect rewards and watch your team grow stronger without constant effort. Use the fast-paced double-speed feature to push through stages quickly.

Exciting Gameplay Variety – More Than Just Idle Battles!

Explore a mix of gameplay modes, including tower defense, roguelike dungeons, cross-server battles, and pet-raising adventures. Whether you have a few minutes or an hour, Lost Age offers something fun and engaging to suit your schedule.

Strategic Team Building – Synergize for Maximum Power

Carefully select and customize heroes with complementary skills to create powerful synergies. The right hero combinations can make your team stronger and more effective in battles.

Legendary Companions – Raise Mythical Pets

Recruit legendary companions that provide powerful buffs and abilities, enhancing your heroes’ strength and helping you conquer tougher challenges.

Social Features – Make Friends and Share the Adventure

Join forces with other players to exchange tips, share rewards, and collaborate in battles. Build lasting friendships as you explore Lost Age together.

name: Lost Age

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i3 or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10，Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Collect and customize powerful heroes, explore magical realms, and tackle thrilling challenges—all at your own pace.
